synopsis.text:
S-ranked adventurer at thirty? Defying the norms is Rick Gladiator, a man who once served behind the Adventurers' Guild counter, now embarking on a thrilling journey to battle monsters and collect rewards. Despite his age and less agile body, Rick's years of experience and training with the legendary Orichalcum Fist, the continent's strongest adventurer party, have equipped him with formidable combat skills and the strength of an elite adventurer.

Rick's life takes an unimaginable turn as he faces dragons, vampires, and other fearsome creatures, proving his mettle against those who dare underestimate him. Will Rick's late start in the adventuring world hold him back, or will his unconventional path lead him to greatness? Join Rick on his exciting quest to discover if he can rise to the top and become a professional adventurer, or if he'll return to his old life at the guild.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
